* max.scheffler <max_scheffler@...> [2008-06-11 22:50]:
> My idea is to use POST and set the enctype to
> 'multipart/form-data'. After successfully saving the uploaded
> file I would return the status code 201 and perhaps the URI
> where the uploaded file could be found now.
> 
> Is this approach practicable?

Yep.

I would be curious about how browsers handle 201 though. You may
be forced to use 303 if they don’t take well to it.

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
